channel.title: GOLDSEEK RADIO
channel.description: Broadcast interviews with top economic and financial experts covering the gold, silver and stock markets. Timely articles, market updates and proprietary technical analysis.
channel.itunes:author: CHRIS WALTZEK
channel.itunes:subtitle: Investing. Stocks, gold and silver.
